dcterms:description: A collection of texts from the Jehovah’s Witness website and various other sources including the African Story Book website, the Universal Declaration of Human Rights, and Mozambican legal documents. The dataset contains 47,415 sentence pairs, amounting to 699,976 word tokens of Emakhuwa and 877,595 word tokens in Portuguese.
dcterms:title: Emakhuwa-Portuguese parallel corpus

dcterms:creator: Jörg Tiedemann
dcterms:description: A collection of parallel data, tools, and interfaces for various languages, including Emakhuwa-Portuguese.
dcterms:title: OPUS

dcterms:creator: Ehsaneddin Asgari
Hinrich Schütze
dcterms:description: A corpus crawled from Bible corpora, providing parallel texts in multiple languages.
dcterms:title: 1000Langs corpus

dcterms:creator: ˇZeljko Agić
Ivan Vulic
dcterms:description: A wide-coverage parallel corpus for low-resource languages, including Emakhuwa.
dcterms:title: JW300

dcterms:description: A project that utilized Jehovah’s Witness resources to create a corpus of Emakhuwa, although it is monolingual and relatively small.
dcterms:title: Crubadán Project

dcterms:description: A project focused on low-resource machine translation for African languages, providing a source of parallel corpora.
dcterms:title: Masakhane project
